parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake system can lead to a loss of vehicle control, increasing the risk of accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: The brakes fail to stop the vehicle
the brakes need to be repaired multiple times
the brakes do not respond as expected.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Axle failure can cause premature wear of tires, leading to reduced traction and increased risk of accidents, as well as potential damage to the trailer and its components.
symptoms: unusual noise or vibration from the axle or wheels.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Incorrect Assembly of Leaf Springs in Trailers
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Incorrect assembly of leaf springs can cause the axle to lock up, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential damage to the trailer and its components.
symptoms: unusual noise or vibration from the axle or wheels
difficulty steering or controlling the trailer.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A loose trailer hitch latch can cause the trailer to sway, leading to loss of control, broken chains, and potentially severe accidents or collisions.
symptoms: The trailer hitch latch feels loose or insecure
the trailer sways or wobbles while in motion
the chains or straps connecting the trailer to the vehicle break
loss of control while towing the trailer.
